com.flowpowered.react.engine.linked

Class LinkedDynamicsWorld

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.flowpowered.react.engine.CollisionWorld
      • com.flowpowered.react.engine.DynamicsWorld
        • com.flowpowered.react.engine.linked.LinkedDynamicsWorld

  • public class LinkedDynamicsWorld
extends DynamicsWorld
    Represents a dynamics world linked to another world. Information is shared between them through an instance of LinkedWorldInfo.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from class com.flowpowered.react.engine.CollisionWorld
